name: The Crooked Man: Memories
description:
There was a crooked man, and he walked a crooked mile.

He found a crooked sixpence upon a crooked stile.

He bought a crooked cat, which caught a crooked mouse,

and they all lived together in a little crooked house.

The Crooked Man: Memories is a small demo and a proof of concept about the tale of The Crooked Man, made in 12h for the MiniJam 54.

The theme of the game jam was memories, and the limitation is that the game must start and end with different genres. My approach was that the game starts as an exploration game with decisions and end up as a survival horror game, and reminding us that sometimes remembering isn't that good.

Note: the demo is incomplete, mostly laking gameplay and all the audio. Will update it as soon as possible.

Made by: Diogo Ferreira
